title: Dragon FIRE E-Sports Supplement - Boost Energy, Focus & Endurance for Gamers - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Key Benefits of Dragon FIRE Focus Formula

Enhances Gaming Performance: Supports energy, focus, and endurance for peak performance during long gaming sessions. Powerful Energy Boost: Caffeine Anhydrous provides rapid energy and alertness, while Kola Nut enhances mental focus. Cognitive Support: Phenylethylamine HCl improves mood and cognitive function, keeping you engaged in the game. Endurance Support: L-Carnitine aids energy production, reducing fatigue, while Raspberry Ketones and Yohimbe Bark promote fat loss. Antioxidant Benefits: Green Tea Extract supports metabolism and overall health, maintaining energy levels.

Why Choose Dragon FIRE Focus Formula?

Enhanced Gaming Performance: Specially formulated to support mental clarity, focus, and sustained energy, Dragon FIRE ensures you stay sharp and responsive during intense gaming sessions. Convenient Dosage: Each bottle contains 60 easy-to-swallow capsules, providing a one-month supply when taken as directed. Safe and Natural Ingredients: Made from high-quality, natural ingredients, ensuring a safe and effective supplement for gamers. Doctor Recommended: Trusted by healthcare professionals for its effectiveness in enhancing gaming performance. Scientifically Backed Ingredients: Our formula includes clinically studied ingredients that have been shown to enhance cognitive function, energy levels, and physical endurance.
shortDescriptionHtml: Enhance your gaming performance with Dragon FIRE Focus Formula by Success Chemistry. Our advanced e-sports supplement boosts focus, energy, and endurance with ingredients like caffeine anhydrous, Phenylethylamine HCl, and green tea extract. Dominate the game now!
supplementFacts:
Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 1 Capsule
Servings Per Container: 60

Amount Per Serving / %DV
Energy Blend 450 mg **
Caffeine, Phenylethylamine HCl, Glucomannan, Fursultiamine, L-Tyrosine
Thermogenic Focus Blend 40 mg **
Green Tea Extract (min. 50% EGCG, min. 98% Polyphenols) (leaf), Raspberry Ketones, Yohimbe bark
Endurance Blend 7 mg **
Kola Nut, L-Carnitine

** Daily Value (DV) not Established

Other Ingredients: Gelatin, Rice Flour, Magnesium Stearate, Silicon Dioxide, FD&C Red #40 & Titanium Dioxide.
Distributed by: successchemistry.com
